transbit.tbits.domain
Class DisplayGroup

java.lang.Object
  transbit.tbits.domain.DisplayGroup
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<DisplayGroup>
public class DisplayGroup
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<DisplayGroup>, java.io.Serializable

This class is the domain object corresponding to the display_group table in the database.

Version:
